title: Launcher Icon
custom_steps: When the user looks at the launcher icon
custom_expected:
Then they see a clear image
And the text under the icon should read "MiLB"

title: Splash Screen
custom_steps: When the user launches the app
custom_expected: Then they see the splash screen and see a clear image and can read that it says "First Pitch" and below that should say "MiLB.com"

title: Favorite Team
custom_preconds:
Fresh install of MiLB First Pitch

(use .Debug build to see notifications during on-boarding)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user initially launched the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: User will recieve prompt asking if you would like to recieve notifications, then you will be brought to the favorite team picker page

custom_steps_separated.content:
When you open the app for the first time
AND you do not choose a favorite team
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then you will be brought to the notifications settings page
AND News notification will be enabled

custom_steps_separated.content:
When you open the app for the first time
AND you do choose a favorite team(s)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then you will be brought to the notifications settings page
AND News and your favorite teams notifications will be enabled

title: Notifications
custom_preconds:
Given the .debug build of the app has been installed
And the app has NOT yet been launched

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user installs the app
And launches the app for the first time
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be prompted with a modal asking them to choose a team from either of three sections: MLB Affiliate, MILB Class or View all MiLB Teams

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user launches the app
And chooses the Class of Favorite Team(MLB Affiliate, AAA, AA, A) 
And the user chooses NOT to add a favorite team
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be taken to the Notifications settings screen
AND News will be automatically enabled

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user launches the app
And chooses the Class of Favorite Team(MLB Affiliate, AAA, AA, A) 
And chooses a team 
And taps the 'Done' button on the upper right
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should be taken to the Notifications settings screen
And Notifications, News, and all the Gameday notifications of your favorite team will be enabled by default

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user launches the app (iPhone Only)
And the user chooses Triple-A as the Favorite Team Class
And is presented with the Triple-A Favorite Team modal
And adds at least one favorite team 
And taps the 'Done' button
And the user taps 'Done' on the Notifications settings page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should be taken directly to that team's page
And the corresponding logo of the team chosen is on the lower left
REPEAT FOR ALL TEAMS

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user launches the app for the first time
AND when the user goes to the scoreboard for the first time
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will get a bubble message pointing to the Class picker on the top center 
AND the bubble message will list all the classes(Triple A, Double A, Class A Advanced, Class A, Class A short season, and Rookie)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user launches the app  (iPhone Only)
And the user chooses Class A as the Favorite Team Class
And is presented with the Class A Favorite Team modal
And adds at least one favorite team
And taps the 'Done' button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should be taken directly to that team's page
And the corresponding logo of the team chosen is on the lower left
REPEAT FOR ALL TEAMS

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user launches the app
And the user chooses Triple-A as the Favorite Team Class
And is presented with the Triple-A Favorite Team modal
And adds at least one favorite team 
And taps the 'Done' button
And the user taps 'Done' on the Notifications settings page
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then when the user goes to the Settings->Push Notifications page all of the settings that were set in the initial flow for notifications is retained
